name: Crusher Morg
title: Bouncer
description: A massive half-orc with scarred knuckles and a surprisingly keen ear for music. He keeps the peace and books entertainment with equal efficiency.

greeting.first_time: Name's Crusher. I handle entertainment here. You play music?
greeting.already_performed: Already played today. Come back tomorrow.

ask_about_performing.text: Sailors like loud music. Sea shanties, work songs, drums. You play once a day. I pay based on instrument and how much the crowd likes you. Charisma matters.

ask_about_rates.text:
We pay for loud instruments sailors like:

Horn: 14 gold - best for sea shanties
Drum: 12 gold - work rhythms
Lute: 13 gold
Bagpipe: 11 gold - sailors love it
Flute: 10 gold
Shawm: 9 gold - loud enough

No viols or lyres. Too delicate. Break easy. Plus charisma bonus.
